title: Fiddlesticks Tattoo <3
body: I did the outline and I got color done by my friend at Drop Dead Tattoo.{{champion:9}}

replies.body: I think I'm going to do all fidd skins around him. Especially Dark Candy!
That sounds like a blast, I'll show my Korean buddy(Fid main) and maybe he'll get inspired to try his own Fiddle tatoo :)
You may have accidentally leveled your fear with that piece of art right there. ;)
That's some really cool ink right there. pretty awesome!
I think the best skin is Pumpkinhead followed by Spectral based on their concepts. This is awesome and someday I hope to have Pumpkinhead Fid as as tattoo as well!
